name: DLink | DxS | Network | IMPB | Unauthenticated IP-MAC (SYSLOG)
description: WARN: Unauthenticated IP-MAC address and discarded by ip mac port binding (IP: 172.16.1.49, MAC: 00-E0-52-85-91-56, Port: 12)

patterns.value_re: (?:WARN:|WARN\(4\)) Unauthenticated IP-MAC address and discarded by ip mac port binding \(IP: (?P<ip>\S+), MAC: (?P<mac>\S+), Port: (?P<interface>\S+)\)$

name: DLink | DxS | Network | IMPB | Recover IMPB stop learning state (SYSLOG)
description: WARN: Port 28 recovers from IMPB stop learning state
event_class__name: Network | IMPB | Recover IMPB stop learning state

patterns.value_re: (?:WARN:|WARN\(4\)) Port (?P<interface>\S+) recovers from IMPB stop learning state$

name: DLink | DxS | Network | IMPB | Dynamic IMPB entry is conflicting with static (SYSLOG)
description: WARN: Dynamic IMPB entry is conflicting with static IMPB(IP: 172.16.0.8, MAC: 00-22-B0-DE-5E-0D, Port: 4)
event_class__name: Network | IMPB | Dynamic IMPB entry is conflicting with static

patterns.value_re: (?:WARN:|WARN\(4\)) Dynamic IMPB entry is conflicting with static IMPB\s*\(IP: (?P<ip>\S+), MAC: (?P<mac>\S+), Port: (?P<interface>\S+)\)$

name: DLink | DxS | Network | IMPB | Unauthenticated IP-MAC (SNMP)
